text_blocks.content:
Fwd: news article pm MCC release
From Kevin Pistro
To Hugh Hurwitz, Michael Carvajal, Ray Ormond
Date 2019/08/15 13:55
Subject: Fwd: news article pm MCC release
Attachments: TEXT.htm
FYSA. Apparently came out early this morning.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email with a forwarded news article link. The email is from Kevin Pistro to Hugh Hurwitz, Michael Carvajal, and Ray Ormond, dated August 15, 2019. The news article link is related to an inmate being mistakenly released from MCC after Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.
